data.actual_result: textbox flickers before message is pasted
data.short_description: Pasting in the note textbox causes it to flicker (does not happen 100% of the time)
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a message in your clipboard ready to paste - Find a user which you have never put a note on - View their miniprofile - Click on the note textbox - Right-click and paste - Observe
